title: Twitter in the Time of Elon Musk
description: What comes next for the social media giant now that it’s under the stewardship of the wealthiest person in the world?
dc:creator: Sabrina Tavernise, Mooj Zadie, Diana Nguyen, Rachelle Bonja, Patricia Willens, Dan Powell, Brad Fisher and Chris Wood

media:content.media:description: Elon Musk has added Twitter to a portfolio that includes Tesla, SpaceX and the Boring Company.
